meanings.sent1: The sheriff locked up the thief in the hoosegow.
meanings.sent2: The hoosegow was filled with criminals of all kinds.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon thought the garbage can was a cozy little hoosegow.
meanings.sent4: Her cluttered room felt like a hoosegow, trapping her in chaos.
meanings.sent5: The old, creaky building loomed like a haunted hoosegow in the night.
